title: Editbar
author: Editbar
content: Shiba Inu teams can go ahead and deliver on promises and ship products that are honestly very good I know that card games aren't everyone's fun type of game but this is honestly a very well-designed game and lots of people are playing it and enjoying it, especially people that are not even inside of Shiba Inu in the ecosystem as a whole so overall I think this is a giant win for Shiba Inu even if it didn't cause a 30 pump in a single day still it's honestly amazing and you guys have to remember very popular saying buy the rumour sell the news yeah that still holds guys this is what we saw with Shiba eternity and what we're most likely going to see also was shibarium and other very large upcoming launches so why do I very strongly believe that there's going to be a strong breakout for Shiba Inu in the short term.

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: The game is lame. The game looks so garbage. This is what they have called that as a promising game. It's not a very well designed game for billions marketcap token like shiba inu. There will be no break out. I saw people were complaining so much on CMC. We have bunch of card games. We need only UE5 game and it's not a garbage game like that. We are in 2022. The games looks like a 2012 game. Are we going back to the 2012? We have a garbage card game called gods unchained. It seems like that shiba metaverse was just gimmick

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Don't hold your hopes so high. I don't think there will be a strong upward breakout in the short time, if it were to happen, it should have already happened with the news. right now the price is only hovering around $0.000011

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on October 09, 2022, 11:59:12 PMDon't hold your hopes so high. I don't think there will be a strong upward breakout in the short time, if it were to happen, it should have already happened with the news. right now the price is only hovering around $0.000011It's very cheap for someone who believes Shib can go far from where it is now. If you could have billions of it and can wait up to more than 10 years while it's developing, I guess that's profitable still. Although it's too wishful thinking to see it happening in a short term, who knows the new generation of crypto newcomers are more of the meme guys and p2e lovers.

comments.author: Silberman
comments.body: Quote from: Editbar on October 08, 2022, 04:53:26 AMShiba Inu teams can go ahead and deliver on promises and ship products that are honestly very good I know that card games aren't everyone's fun type of game but this is honestly a very well-designed game and lots of people are playing it and enjoying it, especially people that are not even inside of Shiba Inu in the ecosystem as a whole so overall I think this is a giant win for Shiba Inu even if it didn't cause a 30 pump in a single day still it's honestly amazing and you guys have to remember very popular saying buy the rumour sell the news yeah that still holds guys this is what we saw with Shiba eternity and what we're most likely going to see also was shibarium and other very large upcoming launches so why do I very strongly believe that there's going to be a strong breakout for Shiba Inu in the short term.If I were you I will try to not be as optimistic as you are, and the reason is simple, right now the market is not really in a position to make that kind of movement regardless of the updates or improvements made in a coin, just look at ethereum, people thought that the merge will bring a lot of growth for ethereum and yet nothing happened, and then we saw a decrease in its price as people began to sell as they were disappointed by the lack of positive results.

comments.author: Ayers
comments.body: Quote from: bittraffic on October 10, 2022, 12:35:19 AMQuote from: Bitcoin_Arena on October 09, 2022, 11:59:12 PMDon't hold your hopes so high. I don't think there will be a strong upward breakout in the short time, if it were to happen, it should have already happened with the news. right now the price is only hovering around $0.000011It's very cheap for someone who believes Shib can go far from where it is now. If you could have billions of it and can wait up to more than 10 years while it's developing, I guess that's profitable still. Although it's too wishful thinking to see it happening in a short term, who knows the new generation of crypto newcomers are more of the meme guys and p2e lovers. it can be said that today's beginners like to take risks in exchange for high returns, that's why we are in bear season and thousands of shitcoins are dying day by day but still a lot of shitcoins are created and hunted by newbies. many people think quite simply that they come here to make money so they will invest anything as long as it is profitable for them, they don't care about technology or who is the most trustworthy person in the market. i've met a lot of young investors with that mindset, the market is becoming more diversified rather than just a bunch of old, top coins

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Until there is a confirmation of a bull run. No altcoin could move fast and gain more than 10x as the market is almost same movement.Even shiba inu could not easily rush in the time like this. But if bulls arrived. Even without news these coins will likely go beyond your expectation. Im not sure what shiba devs are cooking though even major coins have good public releases even at 50% jump is hard.

comments.author: michellee
comments.body: I don't know if Shiba Inu can get another big pump or if it's still waiting for a longer time because crypto market conditions are still like this and we also don't know when that will change. But my advice is if you believe the Shiba Inu will get another pump in the short term, you should start buying more now because the price hasn't started to climb yet and you still get a chance. But apart from that suggestion, you should analyze further and look for more information on the progress of the Shiba Inu project so that it can be your consideration in investing in Shiba Inu.

comments.author: shinratensei_
comments.body: Yeah someone expecting shiba inu to break out just caused by the release of card game. I remember shiba fans were also calling it as shiba metaverse as well. We have dozens of card game in app store or play stores. The game looks horrible. I strongly believe any product being launched by shiba will not make any difference. This project has no revenue at all. The product is not so good as people said. Im not even thinking this token gonna be pumped again like what happened last year. Elon is reason why shiba got pumped so hard. It's not coming from the hype for the project by shiba

comments.author: Tony116
comments.body: Quote from: Editbar on October 08, 2022, 04:53:26 AMShiba Inu teams can go ahead and deliver on promises and ship products that are honestly very good I know that card games aren't everyone's fun type of game but this is honestly a very well-designed game and lots of people are playing it and enjoying it, especially people that are not even inside of Shiba Inu in the ecosystem as a whole so overall I think this is a giant win for Shiba Inu even if it didn't cause a 30 pump in a single day still it's honestly amazing and you guys have to remember very popular saying buy the rumour sell the news yeah that still holds guys this is what we saw with Shiba eternity and what we're most likely going to see also was shibarium and other very large upcoming launches so why do I very strongly believe that there's going to be a strong breakout for Shiba Inu in the short term.Out of all the memecoins, Shiba is indeed a token worth trying, but with this news it is not enough for shiba to make a big breakout in the short term. We are in a bear market, not even the merger event that is considered the biggest milestone of ETH cannot help ETH against these aggressive bears, much less likely with shiba. If you are a fan of memes and shiba then just buy and hold waiting for better bitcoin movement or market rally, you can get profit instead of waiting for these small events.

comments.author: tbct_mt2
comments.body: The crypto market is bearish and still waits for signal of pump or dump from Bitcoin. Altcoins are in red last few weeks and Dogecoin does not have good performance. You can not expect good performance from Shiba Inu if Dogecoin is boring and sideway.Dogecoin, Dogechain, Shiba Inu are elements in a meme ecosystem and Dogecoin in that ecosystem is similar to Bitcoin in crypto market. Dogecoin must fly first and after that you will see a flight from Shiba Inu.Currently I don't see anything that sheds light of Dogecoin rise.

comments.author: bitcampaign
comments.body: at least people don't just store shiba tokens in their wallets but can use them for a game, it's really interesting to make people use shiba tokens to play a game, but as we can see the crypto market is bearish so it's difficult to raise the shiba price higher although there is good news coming for that project

comments.author: Lagduf
comments.body: The short term pump means nothing for us. The price of shiba is dumping back again. people are not feeling good with latest game launched by shiba, they expect even more than it. They are feeling disappointed with the result from game that already promised to be a good game. I know that if you are holders of shiba inu. There will be no break out in short term. The opposite thing may come .

comments.author: Twinkledoe
comments.body: Quote from: Lagduf on October 10, 2022, 04:42:21 PMThe short term pump means nothing for us. The price of shiba is dumping back again. people are not feeling good with latest game launched by shiba, they expect even more than it. They are feeling disappointed with the result from game that already promised to be a good game. I know that if you are holders of shiba inu. There will be no break out in short term. The opposite thing may come . Maybe, the team is just thinking of providing something to the community to continue the hype in shib. But developing a really cool game and that would spend some of their resources is not really their goal here. We will know later on if they can sustain their enthusiasm to build a worthwhile project and not just here because of the hype surrounding it. People should still be cautious touching this token.

comments.author: bittick
comments.body: shib now is lacking the shill, even the recent released game could only make for short lived increase in value, right now many shib holders are waiting for the right time to make sell off in their coin, therefore I could guess that in the future shib could ever hardly increase its value without the shill, even their so called major updates are just gimmicks in general, I guess shib is still meme coins after all.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: bittick on October 10, 2022, 10:17:26 PMshib now is lacking the shill, even the recent released game could only make for short lived increase in value, right now many shib holders are waiting for the right time to make sell off in their coin, therefore I could guess that in the future shib could ever hardly increase its value without the shill, even their so called major updates are just gimmicks in general, I guess shib is still meme coins after all.It was shilled by Elon last year and many have bought it because of him. But even if he starts shilling it again at this time, I'm sure that it will have almost no effect at all and that is because the market we're dealing with is in bear. And no matter what good news and shilling is being done, it won't do because that will be pulled down by the market. If you guys are hopeful for shib to come out, the chance is little that it will be back again to break out. Because projects that has made itself on the high is unlikely to get up again after it has been there.

comments.author: jostorres
comments.body: Quote from: Silberman on October 10, 2022, 01:42:13 AMIf I were you I will try to not be as optimistic as you are, and the reason is simple, right now the market is not really in a position to make that kind of movement regardless of the updates or improvements made in a coin, just look at ethereum, people thought that the merge will bring a lot of growth for ethereum and yet nothing happened, and then we saw a decrease in its price as people began to sell as they were disappointed by the lack of positive results.Yes, it's better to invest calmly so that we won't be disappointed whatever the results will be or if ever the price didn't rise as expected but if it didn't then we can just assume that it was still part of the bear and maybe the real game will only begin once we entered the early bull run.You know it's happening when most of the coins are breaking their resistance levels and not when a single coin is only increasing. This is the failure of those who invest and greatly expect in eth. They see that eth is increasing faster but they didn't look around if other coins are also doing the same. I just noticed that the op is only talking about short term. Well, short term expectations are fine.

comments.author: maydna
comments.body: We'll see that in the near, medium, and long term. And if Shiba is really a good project, there will be a lot of people who want to buy it and invest in Shiba's project. If you are one who already has a Shiba, you need to hold on to a Shiba for a while and wait for the price to continue to increase, and the important thing is not to panic if the price decreases again.We don't know what the Shiba project will be like, and the renewal of the project will prove that Shiba can still compete with other projects. So keep waiting, and if you are confident with the project, you can keep investing by buying more because the price is still below.

comments.author: bittick
comments.body: even though their recent games are good enough, I think if NFTs trend have finally fading like this it's gonna be insignificant, I think shib need to put effort into their smart contract platform more that could guarantees huge increase in value rather than their games, i'm sure with their new smart contract blockchain it could make their market capitalization sky rockets unlike their game that have short lasting trends and gives only temporary increase.

comments.author: RealMalatesta
comments.body: Quote from: jostorres on October 11, 2022, 11:39:01 AMQuote from: Silberman on October 10, 2022, 01:42:13 AMIf I were you I will try to not be as optimistic as you are, and the reason is simple, right now the market is not really in a position to make that kind of movement regardless of the updates or improvements made in a coin, just look at ethereum, people thought that the merge will bring a lot of growth for ethereum and yet nothing happened, and then we saw a decrease in its price as people began to sell as they were disappointed by the lack of positive results.Yes, it's better to invest calmly so that we won't be disappointed whatever the results will be or if ever the price didn't rise as expected but if it didn't then we can just assume that it was still part of the bear and maybe the real game will only begin once we entered the early bull run.You know it's happening when most of the coins are breaking their resistance levels and not when a single coin is only increasing. This is the failure of those who invest and greatly expect in eth. They see that eth is increasing faster but they didn't look around if other coins are also doing the same. I just noticed that the op is only talking about short term. Well, short term expectations are fine.ETH was something that people look at as the "indicator", which means that it would be going up whenever there is something else that goes up. Which is why there are so many people who wanted to go up with it and invested into just ETH.You could definitely find other altcoins that would go up even more, but there are also a lot of coins that didn't go up, or went down, which means that the ones who invested into ETH didn't know what else to invest, and wasn't sure and they wanted to make sure that they invested into something they could trust, that’s it. It’s a lower return, but lower risk investment and it makes sense for people like me who are not sure about other coins.
